event.title: was also taken back on 27th Feb 1662

data.event: Stronghold of Mahalmeera was also taken back on 27th Feb 1662 and the following day, after a valiant struggle, Pen's Bastion (presently, the site of Tehsil office) was secured by Shivaji's army.

event.title: the following day, after a valiant struggle, Pen's Bastion (presently, the site of Tehsil office) was secured

data.event: Stronghold of Mahalmeera was also taken back on 27th Feb 1662 and the following day, after a valiant struggle, Pen's Bastion (presently, the site of Tehsil office) was secured by Shivaji's army.

event.title: visited Pen on two occasions, on 6 August 1668

data.event: Shivaji Maharaj himself visited Pen on two occasions, on 6 August 1668 and 11 May 1674.
